verses.verse: Who is like the wise <S%H2450><s%> man? <S%H3045><s%> And who knows the interpretation <S%H6592><s%> of a thing? <S%H1697><s%> A man <S%H120><s%>'s wisdom <S%H2451><s%> makes his face <S%H6440><s%> shine, <S%H215><s%> and the hardness <S%H5797><s%> of his face <S%H6440><s%> is changed. <S%H8132><s%>
I say, <S%H8104><s%> "Keep the king <S%H4428><s%>'s command! <S%H6310><s%>" because <S%H1700><s%> of the oath <S%H7621><s%> to God. <S%H430><s%>

Don't <S%H926><s%> be hasty to go out <S%H3212><s%> of his presence. <S%H6440><s%> Don't <S%H5975><s%> persist in an evil <S%H7451><s%> thing, <S%H1697><s%> for he does <S%H6213><s%> whatever pleases him, <S%H2654><s%>
for the king <S%H4428><s%>'s word <S%H1697><s%> is supreme. <S%H7983><s%> Who can say <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H6213><s%> "What are you doing?"

Whoever keeps <S%H8104><s%> the commandment <S%H4687><s%> shall not come <S%H3045><s%> to <S%H1697><s%> harm, <S%H7451><s%> and his <S%H2450><s%> wise heart <S%H3820><s%> will know <S%H3045><s%> the time <S%H6256><s%> and procedure. <S%H4941><s%>
For there is <S%H3426><s%> a time <S%H6256><s%> and procedure <S%H4941><s%> for every purpose, <S%H2656><s%> although the misery <S%H7451><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> is heavy on him. <S%H7227><s%>
For he doesn't <S%H3045><s%> know that which will be; <S%H5046><s%> for who can tell him how it will be?

There is no man <S%H120><s%> who has power <S%H7989><s%> over the spirit <S%H7307><s%> to contain <S%H3607><s%> the spirit; <S%H7307><s%> neither does he have power <S%H7983><s%> over the day <S%H3117><s%> of death. <S%H4194><s%> There is no discharge <S%H4917><s%> in war; <S%H4421><s%> neither shall wickedness <S%H7562><s%> deliver <S%H4422><s%> those who practice it. <S%H1167><s%>

All this have I seen, <S%H7200><s%> and applied <S%H5414><s%> my mind <S%H3820><s%> to every work <S%H4639><s%> that is done <S%H6213><s%> under the sun. <S%H8121><s%> There is a time <S%H6256><s%> in which one man <S%H120><s%> has power <S%H7980><s%> over another to his hurt. <S%H7451><s%>

So <S%H3651><s%> I saw <S%H7200><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> buried. <S%H6912><s%> Indeed they came <S%H935><s%> also <S%H1980><s%> from holiness. <S%H4725><s%> They went <S%H935><s%> and were forgotten <S%H7911><s%> in the city <S%H5892><s%> where they did <S%H6213><s%> this. <S%H1892><s%> This also is vanity.

Because sentence <S%H6599><s%> against an evil <S%H7451><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> is not executed <S%H6213><s%> speedily, <S%H4120><s%> therefore the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> is fully set <S%H4390><s%> in them to do <S%H6213><s%> evil. <S%H7451><s%>

Though a sinner <S%H2398><s%> commits <S%H6213><s%> crimes <S%H7451><s%> a hundred times, <S%H3967><s%> and lives long, <S%H748><s%> yet surely I know <S%H3045><s%> that it will be better <S%H2896><s%> with those who fear <S%H3373><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> who are reverent <S%H3372><s%> before him. <S%H6440><s%>

But it shall not be well <S%H2896><s%> with the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> neither shall he lengthen <S%H748><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> like a shadow; <S%H6738><s%> because he doesn't <S%H6440><s%> fear <S%H3373><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>

There is <S%H3426><s%> a vanity <S%H1892><s%> which is done <S%H6213><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> that there are righteous <S%H6662><s%> men to whom it happens <S%H5060><s%> according to the work <S%H4639><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%> Again, <S%H3426><s%> there are wicked <S%H7563><s%> men to whom it happens <S%H5060><s%> according to the work <S%H4639><s%> of the righteous. <S%H6662><s%> I said <S%H559><s%> that this also <S%H1571><s%> is vanity. <S%H1892><s%>

Then I commended <S%H7623><s%> mirth, <S%H8057><s%> because a man <S%H120><s%> has no better thing <S%H2896><s%> under the sun, <S%H8121><s%> than to eat, <S%H398><s%> and to drink, <S%H8354><s%> and to be joyful: <S%H8055><s%> for that will accompany <S%H3867><s%> him in his labor <S%H5999><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of his life <S%H2416><s%> which God <S%H430><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> him under the sun. <S%H8121><s%>

When I applied <S%H5414><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> and to see <S%H7200><s%> the business <S%H6045><s%> that is done <S%H6213><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%> (for also there is that neither day <S%H3117><s%> nor night <S%H3915><s%> sees <S%H7200><s%> sleep <S%H8142><s%> with his eyes <S%H5869><s%>),

then I saw <S%H7200><s%> all the work <S%H4639><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> that man <S%H120><s%> can't <S%H3201><s%> find out <S%H4672><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> that is done <S%H6213><s%> under the sun, <S%H8121><s%> because <S%H834><s%> however <S%H7945><s%> much a man <S%H120><s%> labors <S%H5998><s%> to seek it out, <S%H1245><s%> yet he won't <S%H4672><s%> find it. <S%H2450><s%> Yes even though a wise man thinks <S%H559><s%> he can comprehend <S%H3045><s%> it, <S%H3201><s%> he won't be able to find it. <S%H4672><s%>
